tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE livestock_reproductive_data (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  animal_id INT,
  estrus_cycle_start_date DATE,
  estrus_cycle_end_date DATE,
  pregnancy_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE livestock_data (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    animal_id INT,
    estrus_cycle_start_date DATE,
    estrus_cycle_end_date DATE,
    pregnancy_status VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE PregnancyStatus {id INT PRIMARY KEY,
livestock_id INT,
status VARCHAR(255),
due_date DATE
}

CREATE TABLE livestock (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	breed VARCHAR(50),
	estrus_cycle_status VARCHAR(20),
	is_pregnant BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE estrus_cycle (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	livestock_id INT,
	start_date DATE,
	end_date DATE,
	cycle_type VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE pregnancy_status (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	livestock_id INT,
	status VARCHAR(20),
	test_date DATE,
	notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE breeding_history (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	livestock_id INT,
	breeding_date DATE,
	breeding_notes TEXT
)
